featuredMovies.title: Inception
featuredMovies.overview: Inception is a mind-bending thriller that delves into the world of dreams. Dom Cobb, a skilled thief, is given a chance to have his criminal history erased if he can implant an idea into a target's subconscious.

details.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
details.awards: Academy Award for Best Cinematography, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, Best Visual Effects
